title: Server Pings
body: I've been thinking of making another smurf but this time I want to go into another server, which server will I have the least lag on? Cheers

replies.body:
SEA / CN (ioniya) / JP / KR 

probably something in that order ping from low -> high. not sure about the JP and KR server, outside IP's might be blocked? chinas anticheat technology needs your windows region set to china.

Japan is the lowest on regular LoL around 150 ping. Its a little tough since almost no one speaks English but atleast you dont know when they are flaming you :P

Or you can download the Garena Client and make an account there. There may be servers where you get 100 ping like the Philippines/Indonesia.
